name: Advance Wars
overview: Orange Star's commanding officer has been accused of attacking other countries, causing war to ensue. The battle lines have been drawn, and an elite group of sly strategists is massing troops at the borders of your homeland. In the face of invasion, you have been entrusted to play as tactical adviser for the Orange Star Army. Command 18 different types of ground, air and naval units if you hope to survive the coming wars. Take caution of the terrain and weather as you lead your forces in 114 maps of turn-based warfare.
